website_summaries.verdict: Pricey, but it delivers a balanced formula with no grain to provide health benefits.
pros: Uses only natural meats, vegetables, and fruits in the formula
Food is made and packaged in the United States for premium quality
Added fatty acids promote a healthy coat and skin for the dog
cons: Some dogs don't like the taste
Costs more than other Diamond dog foods

customer_reviews.title: Better yet, no itching
customer_reviews.text: My dog had been on a prescription dog food due to allergies for about a year. This fish and potato recipe is similar to that one but is half the price. Better yet, no itching, sneezing, or hair loss that he had experienced with some other pet food brands I bought in pet stores or grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: MI Emmie

customer_reviews.title: Flake free coat, with a smooth shine
customer_reviews.text: My boy Atlas has always had a dry, flaky cost that I could only slightly keep at bay with a lot of coconut oil. Even then it was still flaky when you pet him. This product is the only one to have made a huge difference, by giving him a healthy flake-free coat without having to use any supplements. Goodbye coconut oil, fish oil and any other supplements. This food has everything my lean 85lb boy needs!
customer_reviews.author: Michael James

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very PLEASED with improvement in my Dogs Health
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased this product because I wanted to get my dog off of grained based food. She has also had a problem with flaking skin, hair loss, and skin sores. She always had a very dry skin problem. Well, to make a long story short, I am on my second bag and the flaking skin, hair loss, and sores have completely disappeared with shiny soft hair. I am totally amazed. And She likes the taste, amazing, she is very picky eater. Thanks Diamond Naturals
customer_reviews.author: shooky

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food !
customer_reviews.text: In the last 10 years I have switched food multiple times however in the last two years I have not strayed from this food much at all great value and great ingredients. I did switch briefly as a new vet was very against grain free food for aging dogs , once back in grain I was dealing with diarrhea, vomiting , skin issues etc went back on this and my 10 year old boxer is back to great health . Our 10 year old lab also loves it but he also eats grass and ants m outside and just about anything else so I would not use him as a critic l.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I was also quite pleased to see she really liked it too
customer_reviews.text: Took a little bit of time to figure out what was causing my dog's allergies, but once I switched over to this grain free dog food I noticed a big difference! I was also quite pleased to see she really liked it too! It costs a little more than what she was previously eating but it's well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J

customer_reviews.title: Dry Food Your Dog Will Eat
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my greyhound on Diamond Naturals for a year and I’ve been pleased overall, but she has some dry skin/dry hair that fat additions in her diet haven’t fixed so we took the dive into grain free. I have a pretty picky eater, and she LOVES THIS STUFF. It smells like fish bait (I got whitefish flavor), so maybe make sure you have an airtight container to store it in. Fingers crossed we see an external manifestation of the food upgrade, but the fact that she loves the palatability is reason enough to buy this tbh.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Does not contain TAURINE
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding this food to my dogs for a few years now. Just found out that TAURINE is a necessary ingredient in Grain-Free dog food. When dogs develop a deficiency of Taurine (often not included in Grain-Free foods) they can have heart problems. My dogs have enjoyed this food which is why I gave two stars, but I just switched to a healthier alternative for them. A grain free that does contain Taurine.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Moldy kibble !!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for about a month and a half. My dogs started not eating their dinner, and after a couple of days, I noticed spots on the kibble. When I looked further, it was mold! So disappointed and disgusted. This was straight from the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this brand and beef flavor!
customer_reviews.text: We've been feeding Diamond Naturals for years to our 3 Jack Russell Terrier pups. We tried the chicken flavor first but two of our three dogs had bad gas problems. Not wanting to give up on the brand due to a family owned pet supply recommendation, they suggested we try the Beef & Sweet Potato flavor. Within a few days the pups were no longer having gas issues. Dogs seemed to really like it and mom likes it as it is Grain-free which is healthier for them. Overall, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M McKellim

customer_reviews.title: This has become our "go to" brand for our Aussie.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to say that Roscoe loves this food, but to be honest - he eats anything other than raw asparagus. This being said, he does really well on this food. His weight is easily managed, his coat is beautiful and his overall health is excellent. At 10 years old he still looks and acts like he did at 3. We like feeding him this food because it is grain free, has meat as the #1, 2 & 3 ingredients and is filled with a great blend of vegetables, vitamins and minerals. A VERY complete food with excellent results. We have never had any issues with digestion either. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Did not agree with my dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have been on a grain free diet for years and I decided to try this because it seemed similar to what they had been eating. A week or so in to this bag of food my larger dog starting loosing hair on her back followed by days of vomiting and a $250 vet bill. Stopped the food and started making food and two weeks later her hair is filling back in and she has not been sick. I would not recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Dog would NOT eat it.
customer_reviews.text: It's not that I hate it, it"s that my dog HATES it. I tried everything; I mixed wet food in it, he ate the wet and left every pellet, I even broke it up in the food processor and mixed it with wet---he would not touch it; then I only offered the Diamond food, he whined and cried with hunger but still would not touch the food. I gave up, and fed him some of my mothers grocery store dog food which he gobbled up. Perhaps this bag was defective/stale? It did not have an odor which several reviewers mentioned? Anyway, I got a refund which I think was only just, thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs #1 choice!
customer_reviews.text: My dog isn’t too much of a picky eater. But if he has an option to choose then he will. Whenever I buy this one he chomps it down! He doesn’t leave one single piece left! It’s definitely his favorite! He is allergic to grain and stuff. This one doesn’t bother him at all!!! It’s soooo worth the price! I try to get it every time if I can. It actually has a smell and doesn’t look all dried out and blah like other dog foods. I can see why he chooses this one! Plus he loves white fish and it seems to help his dry skin!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Digestible food for a working dog
customer_reviews.text: My Springer Spaniel does well on the grain free, higher protein food. It keeps weight on him during high activity periods and is sufficiently filling in lower quantities during down time. Digestive tract health is notably better than it was while he was eating food with grain.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Dimond

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients and good packaging for shipping
customer_reviews.text: Definitely on the med-higher end in price for dog food but the ingredients are better than some other "top" brands I've compared to. Plus this is not on list of brands that the FDA linked to canine heart disease. The packaging is plastic so zero issues with shipping problems. Kibble is standard half dome and a nice size for larger dogs. My dog had no problems switching to this food and gobbled it right up.
customer_reviews.author: Helloisitme

customer_reviews.title: Great combo for dogs with grain & chicken allergies
customer_reviews.text: My pitbull mix has had allergy issues and we have discovered that grain free and avoiding chicken/beef is the way to go. She just finished this first bag of the Whitefish and sweet potato formula and her skin has never looked healthier. She doesn’t itch as much and she is so silky and shiny looking.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta B

customer_reviews.title: Grain free-stink free dog good
customer_reviews.text: MY DOGS LOVE THIS FOOD. I love pumpkin and watching them eat it up makes me want to try it.--JK! I don't even have to add any GRAVY, CHEESE OR ANYTHING ELSE WITH THIS FOOD. Also with the grain free food I noticed their #2 doesn't stink so strongly especially since they are so large. I would definitely recommend this for larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: A definite no.
customer_reviews.text: This food is UNBELIEVABLY dry and my dogs hated it. I was told that this was the best brand I could buy and I do not believe. My dogs preferred Rachel Ray’s Nutrish and Blue Buffalo over this so will be switching back.
customer_reviews.author: K3LLY4LL41N

customer_reviews.title: NOT EDIBLE!  Keep the bag so you can return it!
customer_reviews.text: This food was so hard that neither of my dogs could even chew it. My vet recommended that I soak it in water for 30 minutes to soften it up. I left it for 2 hours and it was just starting to soften up on the outside but was still too hard to chew. I wish I wouldn't have poured it into my container and discarded the bag that came in because I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Denise

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love This and Helps With Dog Farts
customer_reviews.text: Both our puppies had really bad gas. Our vet recommended we switch them to something that had fish as the main ingredient. We decided to try this and we have not been disappointed. Both our little ladies don't clear the room with their farts as much anymore! Both our dogs chow down their food and they love the taste. The price point isn't too bad for the quality dog food you are getting. Video for attention and because who doesn't want to see two cute dogs :)
customer_reviews.author: Tray and Celia Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Grain free dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I laugh when it ask to give the number of stats for flavor i personally haven't tried it. But it is grain free and for 4 months i been on this gluten and sugar free diet and when i get a fresh bag of this it does smell appetizing. My dog has been eating this for 4 years it has been great for him since he has allergies and i never had issues with the company with recalls like so many out there
customer_reviews.author: Haley M.

customer_reviews.title: No more licking
customer_reviews.text: I did not know why my dog was always licking his front legs, this went on for a while, I searched the internet and they said it may because of his food, I switched from the regular dog food made by this company and he stopped licking his front legs, he also has not been getting ear infections as often, so we are very happy with this food, he seems to like it
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I love the Diamond Naturals kibble. My dog has a highly sensitive stomach to low-grade dog foods, but it's hard finding high quality at a reasonable price. My dog is only 20 lbs, so feeding him this twice a day usually lasts about 2 months. It's also the only food he's ever had that he doesn't get sick of eventually (but I'll still switch the flavors around for variety).
customer_reviews.author: The Holga Contessa

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected! Bulldogs don’t like....
customer_reviews.text: I have two bulldogs that were eating Costco brand dog food. Grain free. Costco is out I was told this company makes Costco's dog food. My dogs can’t stand this food. Not sure why but they just won’t touch it! Updating a week later they just hate this food even with canned food! Absolutely bad news!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: no grain dog food!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is the best food that you can buy for the money!!!! my vet said that my 12 year old is the perfect weight for a lab and she just got weighed 70 lbs on the nose!! she just loves the whitefish flavor and I truly believe it is the healthiest protein source for my furry friend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: goldnuggetgal

customer_reviews.title: but someone told me about this food and I really like it. It’s 1/2 the price of honest kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the honest kitchen dog food, but someone told me about this food and I really like it. It’s 1/2 the price of honest kitchen food, but it’s just as amazing. It doesn’t smell like some dog foods smell and he loves it. One negative experience I have had with this food so far is that my bags of dog food arrived with a slice in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Svitlana

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for quite awhile to find an affordable grain-free food that I could commit to for my two year old pitbull. She will eat almost anything, but I have read a lot of feedback that says grain-free is the way to go to avoid developing allergies in pits. I love this for Sasha because the pieces are large - like her mouth - so she must chew longer and can't inhale it so fast! She also had a problem with very loose stool in the past, but since starting this food, it has been solid and consistent. And from what I can tell, this is the cheapest grain-free for the quantity! I am now committed to diamond!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Hunt

customer_reviews.title: We have four dogs and all four love this food
customer_reviews.text: We have four dogs and all four love this food, even the little Shi Tzu girl with her tiny teeth. Our dogs seem to thrive in this food and the two itchy ones seem to itch a little less. We're on our 3rd bag and will continue to stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Patrick MacAhmloiabh

customer_reviews.title: Our pugs really like it.
customer_reviews.text: This food was recommended by our pug breeder. Our dogs our small like 15 and 18lbs. She said that she started blending it in to their food as soon as they could eat it. I like the bigger size then typical dog food. The food is about the size of a dime. I couldn't find may stores that carried it. Interestingly any dry dog that I found in Walmart had small pieces like cat food. It's nice to be able to get a good bag that lasts a while. The fish and sweet potato recipe is a healthy blend.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J

customer_reviews.title: No more itching
customer_reviews.text: Our Yorkinese has severe allergies. We've tried many different dog foods with marginal success. Finally tried this one and he was completely itch-free!!! Of course, I made the mistake of running out and thinking that I could supplement a similar-ingredient store-bought food. Nope, his itching is 24/7 again. Changing back to this and going to be much more careful never to run out again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food quality for price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog food ever!!! I have literally gone through a dozen types of dog food and finally found this one. My dog is picky and seems to only like things with beef in it. However, it's hard to come by dog food that's good for growing puppies and has a beef. I can usually only find ones that are low grade. My dog also seems to have a sensitive tummy so the grain free formula has been such a plus. My dog is eating better than ever and his poo is finally normal and steady.
customer_reviews.author: bittermangoes

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love sweet potatoes!
customer_reviews.text: Grain free is the way to go! Diamond makes a tasty product that delivers good nutrition on a budget. I have older pets, and have switched the dogs and cats to grain-free pet foods. It is hard to find a good product that doesn't cost a fortune, but this one fits the bill. The dogs love the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Anadeel

customer_reviews.title: Our pups approve. The delivery, probably not so much..
customer_reviews.text: Must admit I lied about flavor, as I haven't tasted it, and alexa has failed to understand our dogs language, but safe to say they eat it. Scent is another tricky answer. Do I like it? maybe? Does it smell like dog food, yup.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding Diamond select for years. My gun dogs and house dogs love it. Their coats are always great and even though I graze feed I've never had a weight problem with any of our breeds. It's very pallatable and produces great, non-messy stools. I switched from Pr0 Pl@n all those years ago and never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: God sent for my puppy
customer_reviews.text: It's finally helping my sensitive 9 month old dog. He is able to eat his food without Diaharea or sromach bleeding. Got him a second bag. Love it. His hair looks good, he is more active and is not hungry anymore. It did take him some time to like it.
customer_reviews.author: fieldy

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My senior golden teirievrr likes the flavor. No intestinal side effects. I was glad to find it because it wasn’t available in my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Ingerson

customer_reviews.title: Doggers love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few dog foods I've purchased that hasn't had a recall (at least that I am aware of). My dogs get excited when I open a new bag... they chow it down and it seems to keep them healthy as a bonus. I pay a little more than I would for other dog foods but I think it's worth it. Will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Z

customer_reviews.title: Really great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good kibble that my dog really likes. I was introduced to this by my feed salesman when I told him I couldn't afford Pro Plan, Merrick or Blue Buffalo and so far it's very good. The prices on Amazon and free delivery due to my Prime membership makes this and the canned food from Natural Balance a great bargain, delivered right to my door! Another of my great purchases from "My Amazon", I will never be without Amazon Prime!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roof. Num.. Mum. Num..
customer_reviews.text: Roof. Num.. Mum. Num.. Roof. (Tail wagging). My tummy don't hurt. I am not gassing up the house. I am not licking my arse from the burn of chow. My poop is solid. Love them as training treats. Boring design is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: SD Handler

customer_reviews.title: The Dog LOVES this food I love AMAZON service
customer_reviews.text: My Ridgeback LOVES this food. I’ve been feeding it 6-months and it has made a difference in her coat. Her skin and stomach issues have gone away. Delivery to the doorstep next day with Amazon prime.—- it more economical and convenient than going Sams club and getting a poor quality food.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Since I haven't personally tasted this I am compelled to let my dog's actions speak for me. As soon as I open the bag he is there for a nibble. He enjoys the flavor and I am pleased it doesn't contain a ton of fillers. Every chance the neighbor's girl gets, she runs for his food dish and enjoys it as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies our picky eater
customer_reviews.text: Our senior dog was starting to turn up her nose at the food we'd fed her for the past 5 years. We ran out of food while on vacation so we tried this food on a whim. She loves it! So does our other dog. Glad we were able to find a winner on our first try. Ordering through Amazon is great too, since the pet store where we originally bought the food is not near our home.
customer_reviews.author: Jean McLenigan

customer_reviews.title: I have had the food for two days and my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the food for two days and my dog loves it! I am still mixing with his old food and he eats around the old food to get to this. I ordered the beef flavor because he has allergies and I wanted to be sure he was getting quality food. So far he hasn't had any tummy troubles either from the food.
customer_reviews.author: JenFit4Life

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Allergies
customer_reviews.text: My English Bulldog is allergic to chicken so finding a good beef based dog food is important. His allergies are skin related and I believe that the natural grain free products are overall a better option for his condition. He digests the food well and has less gas too.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great food, happy healthy pup. Diamond Naturals for life!
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients, raised my Aussie on it for years and he's an enormous, athletic, and happy dog. I now cut it with Diamond Naturals Beef and Rice to save on costs, but it's really a great feed. He loves it, as does our new German Shepherd (who would sometimes turn his nose up at Blue). I've given him the Chicken and the Beef formulas and they're both devoured in seconds every mealtime.
customer_reviews.author: jumpit

customer_reviews.title: Great food. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great food. Great price. Been buying at feed store for $39 for 8 years. Took care of itchy skin/shedding issues w rottie and boxer. Vet sai give him benadryl. No! Give your dog grain free food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grain free and great price!
customer_reviews.text: As a mother of four rescues (3 chows and a golden mix), I highly recommend this dog food. My dogs enjoy all three flavors, I always purchase grain-free and the price is right. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Upstate NY lady

customer_reviews.title: The dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this dog food for a while and dog likes it and it seems to work well for him. We had been purchasing it in smaller quantity locally so I suggested buying in larger quantity. We could not find it locally but found it here on Amazon for a slightly better price. Delivery was prompt. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Don O

customer_reviews.title: Diamond Naturals Grain Free Real Meat Recipe Premium Dry Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs that love this food. I use less food because of it's potency. And lastly my dogs both have perfect poops. No sloppy mushy all over the place turds and NO GAS
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Furbabies sort
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs are really enjoying this food. They're still in the transition stage, having mixed brand servings. They will pick out all of this kibble leaving the old brand circling outside their bowls on the floor. I'm happy that their happy.
customer_reviews.author: Davida

customer_reviews.title: Might just be my dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs didn't really care for it and they both got sick after using it. Not sure why the vet said it may have been one of the ingredients. I did switch slowly and have used similar products by other companies without a problem. For the price the ingredients seemed ok not sure what went wrong. I recommend trying it carefully. I have a border collie and a Sheltie and they both didn't do well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this product and so do I!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutley loves this he gets super excited everytime the box comes in the mail. We went from purina to rachel ray to this. Im glad we finally found a grain free formula that does not upset his stomach and that he loves to eat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He no longer has runny poops and diarrhea episodes and everything seems good! He is happy eating it and I'm happy ...
customer_reviews.text: My mini bull terrier is sensitive to poultry and fish and I've been on the search for grain free beef product dry food. He no longer has runny poops and diarrhea episodes and everything seems good! He is happy eating it and I'm happy not picking up runny poop
customer_reviews.author: beaubear

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY MALTIPOO, HAPPY ME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding this to my beautiful Maltipoo 4 years oh, and this is one of her favorites. It's very seldom that she cleans her entire Bowl in one feeding, but with this brand and flavor she devours it. I would highly recommend for a small breed dog, and plus it's green free which is awesome!!! Shipping is extraordinary and I will continue this brand. Thank you so much..
customer_reviews.author: KingOfDeals

customer_reviews.title: my chocolate labs love this dog food
customer_reviews.text: my chocolate labs love this dog food. i can order this through amazon and get it within two days. it is a bit expensive but the dogs are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kerry carnes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Have a German Shepherd and a Cavalier and they both love it!
customer_reviews.author: Triner

customer_reviews.title: Finicky fur babies eating well now
customer_reviews.text: I’m assuming the flavor is great because my fur babies can’t get enough of this dog food even my cat snags a bite here and there
customer_reviews.author: tammie johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food, and it's less expensive than Merrick. I never understood why anyone ever thought rice and corn were good for dogs. Thanks for making a good dog food!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, digestive friendly
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd has food allergies and digestive issues. This food is one of the few he can eat and it is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog, cheaper than most other grain-free foods
customer_reviews.text: My dog requires a grain-free diet or she gets really stinky and itchy and develops a white film in her fur that flakes off all over the house. All that is about as awesome as it sounds, so I get really paranoid about trying new foods for her. I'd been feeding her Taste of the Wild, which we loved, but this is cheaper, so I wanted to give it a try. My dog loves it, and we haven't had any funky allergic reaction. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: FBlair

customer_reviews.title: Healthy for your dog
customer_reviews.text: My little poodle has been eating this for 6 years when other dog food upset her stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeesmama

customer_reviews.title: My dog isn't really a fan but she eventually eats it.
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a great value... but my dog (chocolate lab) will eat anyting and search for more food... yet, she grudgingly eats this. She actually will leave her bowl full for a while and kind of nibble on it and eventually it will get eaten. I find this odd since she's the type that will have all of her food gone in 2 minutes. It might just be my dog but I thought it was worth mentioning since this is odd behavior.
customer_reviews.author: April R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: best food we've tried
customer_reviews.text: we've tried a lot of different dog foods for our 3 y/o dog pal - from highly expensive to not - but this is so far the best. grains irritate his stomach, and so does poultry, so it's free from both of those and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: don't know what it tastes like but do know the ingredients and how my dog loves this compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good healthy dog food.
customer_reviews.text: Have started feeding my dogs this on advice from a soon to be vet/niece. Coats look quite a bit better. Seem a little perkier. And it's probably healthier than some of the other stuff. And USA made.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ray

customer_reviews.title: He was weaned on Whitefish and Sweet Potato and I wanted to continue the same type ...
customer_reviews.text: I feed this Diamond Grain Free Food to my puppy. He was weaned on Whitefish and Sweet Potato and I wanted to continue the same type of food. I was happy that Diamond had their own brand of this food. The puppy gobbles it up and I had no adverse reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: It’s expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact, it is grain free, all meat, but my dog didn’t seem to like it any better than the cheaper ones with grain and meat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whitefish type is issue
customer_reviews.text: Dogs were fine on the beef - changed (gradually) to the whitefish ... weeks later they all still have diarrhea
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Barab

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy that Amazon carries it where most pet foods don’t.
customer_reviews.text: This is a dog food that was suggested to me when I adopted my dog From the SPCA. It is very good for her digestive system and I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and no more allergic reactions
customer_reviews.text: This is really high quality food for pups. We had some bad reactions from other brands and we have 3 dogs to feed. They have no problem with all 3 now which is really nice.We switch different flavours from Naturals but that's it we are sticking with Naturals from here on out
customer_reviews.author: Hman.

customer_reviews.title: This food has helped so much due to the fish and sweet potato which is super important
customer_reviews.text: My dog has such a sensitive tummy and his poops were always mushy. This food has helped so much due to the fish and sweet potato which is super important. Plus it's very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, really makes a dierence!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has ha more energy and a spark in her eyes from two-three days after I swiched her to this grain free from (Diamond Natural's) Large Breed with grain. Great Product.!
customer_reviews.author: Trip

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food
customer_reviews.text: I give this to dog who has a grain allergy, she loves it. In fact my other dog that doesn't have a grain allergy likes this over any other dog food I have given her. Tasty. I gave it 4 stars because the smell is kind of yuck (slightly fishy) and on occasion we get some that is really broken up inside the bag.
customer_reviews.author: LoriR76

customer_reviews.title: No more allergies!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bulldog I started this food like two weeks ago. No more allergies!!! She now has a very shiny coat also!
customer_reviews.author: whitedove

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have allergies and this food helped so much with that... I’ve also noticed my older dog doesn’t get acid reflux anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seem to love it.. swapped from the blue buffalo to this and no digestive issues. Continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Chicken allergies
customer_reviews.text: My blue nose pit is highly allergic to chicken or any of its byproducts, and she LOVES this food. Her coat is extra pretty after I started her on this, as well! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Lluhi

customer_reviews.title: Only food my pup will eat
customer_reviews.text: Love this food, its the only dry food i've ever found my dog to eat without absolute bribery on my part
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Dogs say "5 stars"
customer_reviews.text: My Rat Terriers who have sensitive bellies love their food. Their first coats of are amazing. Thick & so soft. This is such a convenient way to buy.
customer_reviews.author: JennyD1006

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a picky eater with a sensitive stomach and will only eat dry food containing fish and he just loves this. He eats this food with no problem. Ingredients are simple, not crazy and relatively healthy. He's been eating this for over one year now. He's a German Shepherd mixed breed (a rescue), almost 8 years old and very active. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lynda medina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My Pitbull has terrible skin and food allergies and this product helps relieve some of his sensitivity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best for bully breeds
customer_reviews.text: I have a American bulldog with allergies to EVERYTHING. This food makes him healthy, soft, shiney, and regulates his digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: Jo E. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved
customer_reviews.text: We switched our Great Dane/Pit Bull mix to this about 3 months ago after it became obvious to us that he was having problems digesting the other brand of food he was eating and he seems to be enjoying meal time more. Just wish that they made this in a larger size bag other than the 28lb bag they offer, as it is a bit of a pain having to purchase this every few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Great brand. Great flavor with a happy dog.
customer_reviews.text: She loves this brand. Opted for this sweet potato flavor as it was a very good sale. All of their products excellent. If you store a large bag in your coat closet don't get Salmon! We use Prime because as seniors it is hard to lug a big bag down a flight of stairs. This way it comes to the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Christie K.

customer_reviews.title: It's dog food that my dogs like
customer_reviews.text: My dogs eat it. They don't get gassy after eating it.
customer_reviews.author: W. M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Switched to Diamond Grain-Free, Dogs are glad we did.
customer_reviews.text: Switched from Merrick brand grain free and our 3 dogs like this brand better. They are both high quality food and grain free, but they like the flavor blend better and clean their bowls. I have a small, medium, and large breed dog and they all love this food.
customer_reviews.author: BJMC

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for a shiny coat!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this and it makes his fur shiny and thick. We stick to only grain free. My only wish is I wish it would come in a bigger bag. My 85lb German Shepherd does tbeougg it really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The best dog food I bought for my German Shepherd so ...
customer_reviews.text: The best dog food I bought for my German Shepherd so far. After 6 years of feeding him all kinds of grain free advertised food he finally has normal stool!!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Alla Shenkman

customer_reviews.title: Possible quality control issue
customer_reviews.text: My dogs took great on this brand for around six months. They were on the chicken and also the beef. I think something has gone wrong with their quality control and both my dogs started to refuse to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Champion

customer_reviews.title: Keep it on auto ship
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 doggies at home, 1 senior, an adult, and their 2 puppies, and this food is good for all of them! Have had issues with foods causing vomit from grains, this food is great everyone is back being happy healthy pups :) We ordered it, they loved it, then we didn’t order it again fast enough and had to go to petco to get a grain free puppy food to hold us over until next delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knowing it's grain free is comforting.
customer_reviews.text: We have a rescued Malshi and have only fed this to him. NO PEOPLE FOOD ALLOWED. He's very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlee D

customer_reviews.title: but this is the BEST for my money
customer_reviews.text: My Whippet and Chinese Crested eat this every day now. Both of them had skin issues and since they have been on this steadily with out other Junk....their shin has cleared up. I am sure there are others out there that would do the same thing for my dogs, but this is the BEST for my money!
customer_reviews.author: Gilda

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grain and Chicken Allergy
customer_reviews.text: My dog has an intolerance to Grain and Chicken. This is a great product for dogs that need somewhat limited ingredients and are also intolerant to Grains and/or chicken. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Boger Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: My dog is pleased !!
customer_reviews.text: My dog will only eat this food,I feed him with Diamond Naturals Grain-Free Beef & Sweet Potato Formula and know he loved chicken too,I hope he not going to have allergies to chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Me)))

customer_reviews.title: Great for bulldogs
customer_reviews.text: My Olde English Bulldogge loves loves this and it’s helping to keep fungi infections at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: My dogs gobble this up. Previously they would pick and peck at their food and ultimately eat it. NOW, within 5 minutes all the food is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip off, this is the 14lb bag, NOT the 28lb!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE 14LB BAG! ugh, I misread the listing and bought this thinking it was the 28lb....since you know it's priced the same... rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike V

customer_reviews.title: Great Grain Free
customer_reviews.text: We love this food. I have it on Subscribe & Save & it makes life so much easier. Great food, dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget K.

customer_reviews.title: my dog hated it
customer_reviews.text: My Doberman is a picky eater and he would not even smell this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: ... instead of over the c course of the morning like she usually does
customer_reviews.text: My dog especially likes this flavor and eats it all at once instead of over the c course of the morning like she usually does. Also her stools are much smaller, huge bonus for yard clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Ura Beatch

product_meta.title: Diamond Naturals Grain Free Real Meat Recipe Premium Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Beef & Sweet Potato| Size:28 lb

Dogs don’t need grains to be healthy. A protein-based diet free of grains most closely mimics a dog’s ancestral diet. That’s why the first ingredient in this Diamond Naturals Grain-Free formula is real meat for superior taste and nutrition. Sweet potatoes provide complex carbohydrates for all-day energy, while vegetables and fruits add powerful antioxidants for optimal health and vitality.

Ingredients

Beef, lamb meal, sweet potatoes, peas, lentils, pea flour, canola oil (preserved with mixed tocopherols), tomato pomace, flaxseed, fish meal, natural flavor, salmon oil (source of DHA), salt, DL-methionine, choline chloride, taurine, dried chicory root, yucca schidigera extract, tomatoes, blueberries, raspberries, dried Lactobacillus plantarum fermentation product, dried Bacillus subtilis fermentation product, dried Lactobacillus acidophilus fermentation product, dried Enterococcus faecium fermentation product, dried Bifidobacterium animalis fermentation product, vitamin E supplement, iron proteinate, zinc proteinate, copper proteinate, ferrous sulfate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, potassium iodide, thiamine mononitrate (vitamin B1), manganese proteinate, manganous oxide, ascorbic acid, vitamin A supplement, biotin, niacin, calcium pantothenate, manganese sulfate, sodium selenite, pyridoxine hydrochloride (vitamin B6), vitamin B12 supplement, riboflavin (vitamin B2), vitamin D supplement, folic acid.

Contains a source of live (viable), naturally occurring microorganisms.

Guaranteed Analysis

Crude Protein 24% Minimum
Crude Fat 14% Minimum
Crude Fiber 5% Maximum
Moisture 10% Maximum
DHA (Docosahexaenoic Acid) 0.05% Minimum
Zinc 150 mg/kg Minimum
Selenium 0.35 mg/kg Minimum
Vitamin E 150 IU/kg Minimum
Taurine 0.12% Minimum
Omega-6 Fatty Acids* 2.4% Minimum
Omega-3 Fatty Acids* 0.3% Minimum
Total Microorganisms* Not Less Than 80,000,000 CFU/lb
(Lactobacillus plantarum, Bacillus subtilis, Lactobacillus acidophilus, Enterococcus faecium, Bifidobacterium animalis)

Calorie Content

3,580 kcal/kg (335 kcal/cup) Calculated Metabolizable Energy
feature_bullets: HIGH quality PROTEIN made with real PASTURE RAISED beef as the #1 ingredient; optimal amino acid profile for LEAN, STRONG MUSCLES
Premium ingredients with added vitamins & minerals; fruits and vegetables as SUPERFOODS for hard-working ANTIOXIDANTS; fatty acid blend for SKIN & COAT
Nutrient rich and HIGHLY DIGESTIBLE with PROPRIETARY PROBIOTICS that survive and thrive in the GI tract; at guaranteed levels
FAMILY OWNED & run, MADE in the USA choosing ingredients from TRUSTED, SUSTAINABLE sources around the world; Call with questions 800 442 0402
NO corn, wheat, filler; NO ARTIFICIAL flavors, colors, or preservatives added; Made with scientifically advanced food safety protocols

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
